title: Getting started
text: PCS codes composed seven alphanumeric characters. character contains 34 possible values. seven characters make complete code specific meanings vary 17 sections manual. value represents specific option general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) 24 letters (-H, J-N, P-Z) may used character. letters O used avoid confusion digits 0 1.

title: Getting started
text: character axis classification specifies information procedure performed. Within defined code range, character specifies type information axis classification. example, fifth axis classification specifies Approach sections 0 4 7 9 system.

title: Getting started
code: sections() #> # A tibble: 17 × 4 #>     axis name    code  label                                                 #>    <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>                                                 #>  1     1 Section 0     Medical and Surgical                                  #>  2     1 Section 1     Obstetrics                                            #>  3     1 Section 2     Placement                                             #>  4     1 Section 3     Administration                                        #>  5     1 Section 4     Measurement and Monitoring                            #>  6     1 Section 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance #>  7     1 Section 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies                  #>  8     1 Section 7     Osteopathic                                           #>  9     1 Section 8     Other Procedures                                      #> 10     1 Section 9     Chiropractic                                          #> 11     1 Section B     Imaging                                               #> 12     1 Section C     Nuclear Medicine                                      #> 13     1 Section D     Radiation Therapy                                     #> 14     1 Section F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology      #> 15     1 Section G     Mental Health                                         #> 16     1 Section H     Substance Abuse Treatment                             #> 17     1 Section X     New Technology

title: Getting started
code: systems() #> # A tibble: 114 × 4 #> axis name code label #> #> 1 2 Body System 00 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves #> 2 2 Body System 01 Peripheral Nervous System #> 3 2 Body System 02 Heart and Great Vessels #> 4 2 Body System 03 Upper Arteries #> 5 2 Body System 04 Lower Arteries #> 6 2 Body System 05 Upper Veins #> 7 2 Body System 06 Lower Veins #> 8 2 Body System 07 Lymphatic and Hemic Systems #> 9 2 Body System 08 Eye #> 10 2 Body System 09 Ear, Nose, Sinus #> # ℹ 104 more rows joined <- systems() |> select(sys.axis = name, sys.code = code, sys.label = label) |> rowwise() |> mutate(code = splitter(sys.code)[1]) |> ungroup() |> left_join(sections(), by = join_by(code)) |> select(axis = name, code, label, sys.axis, sys.code, sys.label) joined #> # A tibble: 114 × 6 #> axis code label sys.axis sys.code sys.label #> #> 1 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 00 Central Nervous Syst… #> 2 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 01 Peripheral Nervous S… #> 3 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 02 Heart and Great Vess… #> 4 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 03 Upper Arteries #> 5 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 04 Lower Arteries #> 6 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 05 Upper Veins #> 7 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 06 Lower Veins #> 8 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 07 Lymphatic and Hemic … #> 9 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 08 Eye #> 10 Section 0 Medical and Surgical Body System 09 Ear, Nose, Sinus #> # ℹ 104 more rows joined |> select(section = label, code = sys.code, system = sys.label) |> gt(groupname_col = "section", rowname_col = "system") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = code) |> cols_label(code = "") |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps(locations = c("row_group")) |> opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024")) |> tab_options( heading.title.font.size = px(22), table.font.size = px(14), column_labels.border.bottom.width = px(0), column_labels.border.top.width = px(0), row_group.font.size = px(16), )

title: Getting started
code: prp <- procedural:::prep("001") prp #> $split #> [1] "0" "0" "1" #>  #> $section #> [1] "0" #>  #> $system #> [1] "00" #>  #> $table #> [1] "001" prp$section <- sections(prp$section)[c('code', 'label')] prp$system <- systems(prp$system)[c('code', 'label')] prp$table <- tables(prp$table)[c('table', 'description', 'codes')] prp #> $split #> [1] "0" "0" "1" #>  #> $section #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   code  label                #>   <chr> <chr>                #> 1 0     Medical and Surgical #>  #> $system #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   code  label                                     #>   <chr> <chr>                                     #> 1 00    Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves #>  #> $table #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #>   table description                                                   codes      #>   <chr> <chr>                                                         <list>     #> 1 001   Medical and Surgical, Central Nervous System and Cranial Ner… <spc_tbl_> # BR Imaging, Axial Skeleton, Except Skull and Facial Bones # C9 Nuclear Medicine Ear, Nose, Mouth and Throat # D9 Radiation Therapy Ear, Nose, Mouth and Throat # G Mental Health # H Substance Abuse Treatment  tables("dg2") #> # A tibble: 1 × 5 #>   section system table description                                    codes      #>   <chr>   <chr>  <chr> <chr>                                          <list>     #> 1 D       DG     DG2   Radiation Therapy, Endocrine System, Stereota… <spc_tbl_>

title: Getting started
code: definitions() |>    summarise(n = n(),              .by = c(code, section, axis, axis_name)) #> # A tibble: 29 × 5 #>    code  section              axis  axis_name     n #>    <chr> <chr>                <chr> <chr>     <int> #>  1 0     Medical and Surgical 3     Operation    31 #>  2 0     Medical and Surgical 6     Device      433 #>  3 0     Medical and Surgical 5     Approach      7 #>  4 1     Obstetrics           3     Operation    12 #>  5 1     Obstetrics           5     Approach      6 #>  6 2     Placement            3     Operation     7 #>  7 2     Placement            5     Approach      1 #>  8 3     Administration       3     Operation     3 #>  9 3     Administration       5     Approach      6 #> 10 3     Administration       6     Substance    35 #> # ℹ 19 more rows definitions() |>   filter(     code == "0"      ,axis == "3"      ,label == "Bypass"     ) #> # A tibble: 1 × 8 #>   code  section            axis  axis_name label definition explanation includes #>   <chr> <chr>              <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>      <chr>       <chr>    #> 1 0     Medical and Surgi… 3     Operation Bypa… Altering … Rerouting … Coronar…

title: Getting started
code:
pcs("0016070") |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, code)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps() |> opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024
"), subtitle = html("SECTION: 0 Medical and Surgical
SYSTEM: 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
OPERATION: 1 Bypass

"))

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: library(procedural)

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: sections() #> # A tibble: 17 × 4 #>     axis name    code  label                                                 #>    <int> <chr>   <chr> <chr>                                                 #>  1     1 Section 0     Medical and Surgical                                  #>  2     1 Section 1     Obstetrics                                            #>  3     1 Section 2     Placement                                             #>  4     1 Section 3     Administration                                        #>  5     1 Section 4     Measurement and Monitoring                            #>  6     1 Section 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance #>  7     1 Section 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies                  #>  8     1 Section 7     Osteopathic                                           #>  9     1 Section 8     Other Procedures                                      #> 10     1 Section 9     Chiropractic                                          #> 11     1 Section B     Imaging                                               #> 12     1 Section C     Nuclear Medicine                                      #> 13     1 Section D     Radiation Therapy                                     #> 14     1 Section F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology      #> 15     1 Section G     Mental Health                                         #> 16     1 Section H     Substance Abuse Treatment                             #> 17     1 Section X     New Technology

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface

title: ICD-10-PCS Body Systems — systems

title: ICD-10-PCS Body Systems — systems
